sub_title: Trainer / Coach bij Dutch Customs and Tax Office
summary:
With both master degrees in Business Science and Engineering, Anne Pier has a broad experience as an consultant and trainer in working with non-profit organizations for over 30 years. The last five years particularly focusing on increasing organizational effectiveness through enhancing awareness interdependency between individuals by implementing circular methods in general and Agile Scrum frameworks more specifically.
Main qualities are a deep understanding and experience of the connection between people.

Research shows, that in a globally interconnected world, the best innovations and deepest work satisfaction result from using a circular approach. The synchronicity produced through the use of specialized roundtable techniques, will allow participants to experience the sublimity of effective problem-solving, while simultaneously improving organizational unity and work motivation. 

Through the approach of PULSE, that consists of experiential, reflective, active, game-based and peer-to-peer learning, participants acquire not only knowledge and experience of the principles that govern modern society, but they also in an entertaining way improve communication skills, achieve a high level of cooperation and mutual responsibility and awaken the awareness of interdependence between them.
 
Also, by collaboration between participants, which is not limited by usual differences (gender, socio-economic status, education level), a natural flow of ideas and talents is being enabled so participants are encouraged to come up with high-level innovations during the training that will help them to build a productive enviroment, even in their own organizations/teams according to principles they themselves adopt.

Participants experience:
•	New energy, new ideas;
•	Joy in life, trust in the proces en willingness to give their commitment to necessary changes;
•	Concrete results in relation to the operational work.

Also on YouTube, PULSE Human development

profile_positions.description:
Training and coaching teams in an ICT environment to become more Agile and be willing to take more ownership. 
Coaching on connection, unity and on servant leadership.
profile_positions.title: Trainer / Coach

profile_positions.description:
To build teams in creating more passion, pleasure and performance in the workingplace. 
Main topics are: collaboration, communication and trust. 
Using a circular method in combination with Game Based Learning we come to a new awareness of the power of the environment and unity. This enables us amongst others, to come to innovative, lasting results and solutions!
profile_positions.title: Trainer / Coach

profile_positions.description:
Implementing educational programs to increase organizational effectiveness by using human potential to change cultures and outcomes resulting in increased organizational benefits (Implementation program department DTO).
Trainingsessions for DTO, IWG and Hogeschool Windesheim. Also municipalities abroad: Slovenia, Bulgaria and Sweden.
profile_positions.title: Trainer / productmanagement

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities Consultant: collaboration between different organizations and implementation across borders of responsibility. Advising  managementteams. Accompanying groups and leaders/managers along the theme of Leadership en Connection. Organizing Events.

Responsibilities Accountmanager: Guiding clients in making achievable requirements. Managing
Accountteam (10 empl.). Responsible for delivering ICT projects and products 
in complex and political sensitive environment whilst maintaining a good relation with the client.

Responsibilities Projectmanager: Building and implementing several tools, amongst others 
Tooling for Helpdesk. Responsible projectbudgets approx. € 500.000 . Delivering complex and highly innovative projects within time and budget.
profile_positions.title: Consultant / Accountmanager / Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: Making and executing governmental energysaving policies.
Working with local governments, budgets, stakeholders, national policies. 
Responsible projectbudgets approx. € 100.000.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager (Renewable Energy)
